gurmukhi: qurwKwV Ar Ar pd Awid aucwrIAY ]qIn bwr niRp pdih AMq qih DwrIAY ]S`qRu bhur pun AMq qvn ky Twn kY ]ho skl qupk ky nwm lIjIAhu jwn kY ]1307]
transliteration: Turaakhaar Ar Ar Pad Aadh Oucdareeai|| Teen Baar Nrip Padah(i) Ant Tah Ddareeai|| Shattru Bahur Poun Ant Tavan Ke Thaan Kai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Leejeeauh Jaan Kai||1307||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Tukhaar ari ari”, add the word “Nrip” three times at the end, then adding further the word “shatru” at the end, know all the names of Tupak.1307.

gurmukhi: irp pwkr irp Sbd AMq iqh BwKIAY ]nwiek pd qRY bwr qvn ky rwKIAY ]irp pun qwky AMq suGr kih dIjIAY ]ho nwm qupk bhu cIn aucwirXo kIjIAY ]1308]
transliteration: Rip Paakar Rip Shabad Ant Tih Bhaakheeai|| Naaik Pad Trai Baar Tavan Ke Raakheeai|| Rip Poun Taake Ant Soughar Kah(i) Deejeeai|| Ho Naam Toupak Bahu Cheen Ouchaariyo Keejeeai||1308||
translation: Saying the words “Ripupaakar ripu”, add the word “Naayak” three times, then uttering the word “Ripu” at the end, pronounce the names of Tupak.1308.

gurmukhi: ieMdRwNqk Ar Awid Sbd ko BwKIAY ]nwiek pd qRY bwr qvn ky rwKIAY ]S`qRu Sbd pun qwky AMq DrIjIAY ]ho skl qupk ky nwm jwn mn lIjIAY ]1309]
transliteration: Indraantak Ar Aadh Shabad Ko Bhaakheeai|| Naaik Pad Trai Baat Ardan Pad Ant Pramaaneeai|| Shattru Shabad Poun Taake Ant Ddareejeeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Jaan Man Leejeeai||1309||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Indrantak ari”, add the word “Naayak” three times, then adding the word “shatru” at the end, know all the names of Tupak in your mind.1309.

gurmukhi: dyv Sbd ko muK qy Awid bKwnIAY ]Ardn kih Ardn pd AMq pRmwnIAY ]qIn bwr piq Sbd qvn ky BwKIAY ]ho Air kih nwm qupk ky mn mih rwKIAY ]1310]
transliteration: Dev Shabad Ko Moukh Te Aadh Bakhaaneeai|| Ardan Kah(i) Ardan Pad Ant Pramaaneeai|| Teen Baar Pat(i) Shabad Tavan Ke Bhaakheeai|| Ho Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Man Maih Raakheeai||1310||
translation: Uttering the word “Dev” from your mouth, add the word “ardan” at the end, after that speak the word “Pati” three times, then adding the word “ari”, know the names of Tupak in your mind.1310.

gurmukhi: Amrw Ardn Sbd su muK qy BwKIAY ]nwiek pd qRY bwr qvn ky rwKIAY ]irp kih nwm qupk ky suGr pCwnIAY ]ho Bydw BYd kibq ky mwih bKwnIAY ]1311]
transliteration: Amraa Ardan Shabad Su Moukh Te Bhaakheeai|| Naaik Pad Trai Baar Tavan Ke Raakheeai|| Rip Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Soughar Pachhaadeeai|| Ho Bhedaa Bhed Kabit Ke Maah(i) Bakhaaneeai||1311||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Amraa ardan”, add the word “naayak” three times, then uttering the word “Ripu”, use the nanes of Tupak in poetry without any discrimination.1311.

gurmukhi: inrjrwir Ardn pd piRQm aucwr kY ]qIn bwr niRp Sbd qvn ky fwr kY ]Air kih nwm qupk ky suGr lhIjIAY ]ho AiV`l CMd ky mwih infr huie dIjIAY ]1312]
transliteration: Nirjadaar(i) Ardan Pad Pritham Ouchaar Kai|| Teen Baar Nrip Shabad Tavan Ke Daar Kai|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Soughar Laheejeeai|| Ho Adill Chhand Ke Maah(i) Nidar Hue Deejeeai||1312||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Nirjaraari ardan”, add the word “Nrip” three times, then uttering the word “ari”, know the names of Tupak for using them in Aril stanza.1312.

gurmukhi: ibbuDwNqk AMqk Sbdwid aucwr kr ]qIn bwr niRp Sbd qvn ky fwr kr ]irp kih nwm qupk ky suGr ibcwrIAY ]ho CMd ruAwlw mwNJ inSMk aucwrIAY ]1313]
transliteration: Bibudhaantak Antak Shabadaadh Ouchaar Kar|| Teen Baar Nrip Shabad Tavan Ke Daar Kar|| Rip Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Soughar Bicdareeai|| Ho Chhand Ruaalaa Maanjh Nishank Oucdareeai||1313||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Vibudhantak antak”, ad the word “Nrip” htree times , then uttering the word “ripu”, know the names of Tupak for using them unhesitatingly in Rooaalaa stanza.1313.

gurmukhi: sprbwx pir Air pd piRQm BxIjIAY ]qIn bwr piq Sbd qvn pr dIjIAY ]Air pd BwK qupk ky nwm pCwnIAhu ]ho CMd cMcrIAw mwNJ infr huAY TwnIAhu ]1314]
transliteration: Saparbaan Par(i) Pad Pritham Bhaneejeeai|| Teen Baar Pat(i) Shabad Tavan Par Deejeeai|| Ar(i) Pad Bhaakh Toupak Ke Naam Pachhaadeeauh|| Ho Chhand Channddareeaa Maanjh Nidar Huai Thaaneeauh||1314||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Saparbaan pari ari”, add the word “Pati” three times, then uttering the word “ari”, know the names of Tupak and use them fearlessly in Chancherayaa stanza.1314.

gurmukhi: piRQm Sbd qiRdvys aucwrn kIjIAY ]Air Air kih niRp pd qRY vwr BxIjIAY ]S`qRu Sbd qwky pun AMq aucwrIAY ]ho skl qupk ky nwm sbu`D ibcwrIAY ]1315]
transliteration: Pritham Shabad Tridves Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Ar(i) Ar(i) Kah(i) Nrip Pad Trai Vaar Bhaneejeeai|| Shattru Shabad Taake Poun Ant Oucdareeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Sabuddh Bicdareeai||1315||
translation: Saying the word “Tridevesh”, add the words “ari ari” and then the word “Nrip” three times, then connect to word “shatru” at the end and know the names of Tupak.1315.

gurmukhi: biRMdwrk Ar Ar Sbdwid aucwir jY ]qIn bwr Air Sbd qvn ky fwir jY ]S`qRu Sbd qwky pun AMq BnIjIAY ]ho skl qupk ky nwm sumiq lih lIjIAY ]1316]
transliteration: Brindaarak Ar Ar Shabadaadh Oucdaar(i) Jai|| Teen Baar Ar(i) Shabad Tavan Ke Daar(i) Jai|| Shattru Shabad Taake Poun Ant Bhaneejeeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Soumat(i) Lah(i) Leejeeai||1316||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Brindaarak arei ari”, add the word “ari” three times, then uttering the word “Shatru” at the end, and know the names of Tupak.1316.

gurmukhi: sB ibvwn ky nwm BwiK giq BwKIAY ]Air Air kih niRp cwr bwr pd rwKIAY ]bhur S`qRu pun AMq qvn ky dIjIAY ]ho skl qupk ky nwm sumiq lih lIjIAY ]1317]
transliteration: Sabh Bivaan Ke Naam Bhaakh(i) Gad(i) Bhaakheeai|| Ar(i) Ar(i) Kah(i) Nrip Chaar Baar Pad Raakheeai|| Bahur Shattru Poun Ant Tavan Ke Deejeeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Soumat(i) Lah(i) Leejeeai||1317|
translation: Saying the names of all air vehicles, utter the word “gati”, then speaking “ari ari”, add the word “Nrip” four times, then add the word “shatru” at the end and know the names of Tupak intelligently.1317.

gurmukhi: Awid Agnijm pd ko su puin bKwnIAY ]Air Air kih niRp cwr bwr pun TwnIAY ]irp pd BwiK qupk ky nwm pCwnIAY ]ho kibq kwib ky mwNiJ inSMk pRmwnIAY ]
transliteration: Aadh Agadjim Pad Ko Su Poun(i) Bakhaaneeai|| Ar(i) Ar(i) Kah(i) Nrip Chaar Nrip Chaar Baar Poun Thaaneeai|| Rip Pad Bhaakh(i) Toupak Ke Naam Pachhaadeeai|| Ho Kabit Kaab(i) Ke Maanjh(i) Nishank Pramaa
translation: Saying the word “Agnjim”, then uttering “ari ari”, add the word “Nrip” four times ,then speaking the word “Ripu” recognize the names of Tupak and use them unhesitatingly in the stanzas of poetry.1318.

gurmukhi: ieiq sRI SsqR nwm mwlw purwxy pwNcvoN AiDAwie smwpqm squ suBm squ ]
transliteration: It(i) Srishastra Naam Maalaa Puraane Paanchvon Adhiaae Samaaptam Sat(u) Soubham Sat(u)||
translation: End of the fifth Chapter of Shastra Naam Maalaa Purana.
